requirements.scenario: Verify that user can search for ads by entering a keyword or phrase

test_steps.action: Enter a valid keyword or phrase in the search input field

requirements.expected_result: Search results related to the entered keyword or phrase are displayed

requirements.scenario: Verify that user can select a category for the search

test_steps.action: Select a valid category from the dropdown menu

requirements.expected_result: Search results related to the selected category are displayed

requirements.scenario: Verify that user can select a subcategory for the search

test_steps.action: Select a valid subcategory from the dropdown menu

requirements.expected_result: Search results related to the selected subcategory are displayed

requirements.scenario: Verify that user can select a region for the search

test_steps.action: Select a valid region from the dropdown menu

requirements.expected_result: Search results related to the selected region are displayed

requirements.scenario: Verify that user can search for ads within a specific time period

test_steps.action: Select a valid time period from the dropdown menu

requirements.expected_result: Search results within the selected time period are displayed

requirements.scenario: Verify that user cannot search without entering a keyword or phrase

test_steps.action: Leave the search input field empty

requirements.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that a keyword or phrase is required

requirements.scenario: Verify that user cannot search with an invalid category

test_steps.action: Select an invalid category from the dropdown menu

requirements.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the selected category is invalid
